alert.note: Alert for Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 24 at 12:53PM MDT until April 26 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Montana... Milk River at Nashua affecting Valley County. For the Milk River...including Saco, Tampico, Malta, Dodson, Glasgow, Nashua...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Milk River at Nashua. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, This is flood stage. Low land flooding is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM MDT Monday the stage was 20.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:00 PM MDT Monday was 21.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 14.5 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.0 feet on 04/06/1955. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon by 1215 PM MDT.
